mapper.select:
select
distinct
'true' as QUERYID,
from attence_events
order by ${orderByClause}

update attence_events set user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, signed_time = #{signedTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, signed_address = #{signedAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, signed_longitude = #{signedLongitude,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, signed_latitude = #{signedLatitude,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, signout_time = #{signoutTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, signout_address = #{signoutAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, signout_longitude = #{signoutLongitude,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, signout_latitude = #{signoutLatitude,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, state = #{state,jdbcType=TINYINT}, valid = #{valid,jdbcType=TINYINT}, description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, lated_for_time = #{latedForTime,jdbcType=INTEGER}, le_for_time = #{leForTime,jdbcType=INTEGER}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, creator = #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, updator = #{updator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, optional1 = #{optional1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, optional2 = #{optional2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, optional3 = #{optional3,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where se_id = #{seId,jdbcType=CHAR}
mapper.select:
SELECT ae.se_id, ae.user_id, ae.updator as userName, ae.lated_for_time, ae.le_for_time, ae.state, ae.update_time
FROM attence_events ae WHERE ae.user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND ae.update_time BETWEEN #{start,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} AND #{end,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} ORDER BY ae.update_time ASC

SELECT de.*, c.comment_id as c_comment_id, c.user_id AS c_user_id, c.creator AS c_creator, c.create_time AS c_create_time, c.content AS c_content FROM attence_events de left JOIN comments c ON de.se_id = c.event_id where de.se_id = #{eventId,jdbcType=CHAR} and de.valid = 0 ORDER BY c.update_time DESC
